pages.text: While a Vindicator can be raised as a Zombie, a Pillager a Skeleton, to truly make a proper undead version of the powerful Evokers and other Illager spellcasters, one must be more... spiritual in their pursuit.

Unlike the other two, Bound Evokers can float above ground and is unaffected by gravity. Despite their spiritual looks, they cannot phase through walls and can still be harmed with conventional weaponry.
Bound Iceologers are as chilly as they are in life but, this time, their Ice Chunks are falling on someone else's head instead of yours.
These bound souls can be healed by right-clicking on them with Ectoplasm.
